idea-plugin.name: QAI - QA Automation AI Agent
idea-plugin.description:
QAI brings the QA Automation AI Agent directly into your IDE.

Features:
  • Embedded terminal running qai-cli inside a tool window
  • Chat with AI models (Ollama, OpenAI, Anthropic, xAI, Zen) without leaving the IDE
  • ReAct agent mode: the agent can read, write, and edit files in your project
  • Automatic detection of the qai-cli binary with a helpful notification if missing
